content: this pattern is for an adult/teen size hat best part is it only uses one skein of charisma yarn even the tweeds which are smaller skeins supplies loops & threads charisma yarn 93 yards uses only one skein size j 6 mm hook tapestry needle gauge 5 x 5 square is 12 stitches wide by 6 row alternating half_double_crochet & double_crochet tall stitches used chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet hdc2tog half_double_crochet decrease double_crochet double_crochet decrease double_crochet decrease blo back loops only crocheting in 3rd loop of a half_double_crochet row check out the messy bun version https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/one-skein-charisma-messy-bun-hat follow me on instagram for pattern releases @themittenhooker tag me or the pattern on instagram #themittenhooker #charismabeanie check out my etsy shop www themittenhooker etsy com
